text.div:
Date/time selection qualifier

CodeDescriptionDeutsch (German)Nederlands (Dutch)CommentVersion
1ST First value within rangeerster WertEerste waarde binnen bereikdeprecatedadded v2.2, removed after v2.6
ALL All values within the rangealle WerteAlle waarden binnen bereikdeprecatedadded v2.2, removed after v2.6
LST Last value within the rangeletzter WertLaatste waarde binnen bereikdeprecatedadded v2.2, removed after v2.6
REV All values within the range returned in reverse chronological order (This is the default if not otherwise specified.)alle Werte in umgekehrter chronologischer ReihenfolgeAlle waarden binnen bereik in omgekeerde chronologische volgorde. (Standaard tenzij anders gespecificeerd.)deprecatedadded v2.2, removed after v2.6

name: v2 Date/time selection qualifier
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0158 ( Date/time selection qualifier)

property.description: The date at which a concept was deprecated. Concepts that are deprecated but not inactive can still be used, but their use is discouraged

concept.display: All values within the range returned in reverse chronological order (This is the default if not otherwise specified.)

designation.value: alle Werte in umgekehrter chronologischer Reihenfolge
Alle waarden binnen bereik in omgekeerde chronologische volgorde. (Standaard tenzij anders gespecificeerd.)
